name: Send a Telegram message when a Trello card is moved
description: Stay updated on your Trello board's activity with this efficient template! Every time a card is moved in Trello, Make will automatically send a reply message via Telegram. This integration ensures that your team stays informed in real-time about important changes, enhancing collaboration and communication. Perfect for teams that rely on Trello for project management and want to keep everyone in the loop effortlessly!
